This isn't going to go down well, is it... ( ._.)

Oh geez let me get in here real quick... Like we said [in the rotating game modes announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue), we're not bringing URF back on April 1 (but it will be appearing at least twice this year). 

Popstar Urf posts lots of stuff on the site :)
You got me before Rito, but not this time. this rotation is just a prank.
It's just a prank bro {{summoner:31}}
Methinks the lady doth protest too much.

See, the problem is that it's April Fool's Day. No one's going to trust you on this until it hits, or doesn't. Good luck with the people mad because you weren't clear enough. Kappa
We're trying :( I hope no one is too bummed out when they find out we're not running some sort of elaborate URF prank.

That's the joke. It won't be very elaborate, but it will be an URF Prank.

On a serious note, I was really upset with the last April Fools splash and Amumu being left out in the rain alone (I get it, it's his 'thing,' please no rage). 
I had a similar experience when I was a  kid and it sticks with you :( {{item:3073}} 

After that splash, I always wanted a follow up splash of Forecast Janna {{champion:40}} shielding Amumu with her umbrella, Morgana {{champion:25}} bringing him cupcakes because the 'cake' got ruined, Lux {{champion:99}} lighting up the sky with little balls of light, Braum {{champion:201}} bringing the cheer and fluffy poros{{summoner:31}}  (who can be sad with poros!) and, of course, Annie {{champion:1}} coming to give him a hug. Then Nami{{champion:267}} , Udyr{{champion:77}} , Soraka {{champion:16}} and Nasus {{champion:75}} realize they forgot Amumu {{champion:32}} and let them inside to munch on cupcakes and have fun together. :)

Anyway, I'm glad to see he's getting a party, and Amumu, I'll be there {{summoner:12}} - promise. :)

The rain beat down upon the sad mummy as he looked in through the window... Everyone was so happy in there, and yet here he was, out on the street looking in. At least they were having fun...

A moment later something changed. The rain stopped? No, there was still thunder above.

"Hey, how come you are out here all alone, Amumu?" Came the sweet voice of Janna. He always liked Janna. She did everything she could to keep everyone safe and healthy.

"I-I didn't wanna interrupt them." He said softly, looking down to his soaked bandages.

"No one should be alone in the rain." Another voice? It was morgana, the fallen angel lady. She was kinda scary, usually, but today she was dressed as a baker, Pantheon behind her, both holding umbrellas and boxes of warm things.

"Oh, Amumu, come on, you can come in with us." Lux said, her wand gently waving as the lights around the area lit back up, her hair a bit wet with the rain, but it didn't seem to affect her mood as she shot a few balls of light into the air, laughing in her funny way.

Braum was there too, holding his shield above his head, easily twenty fluffy, panting poros riding on his massive shoulders and in his pockets. "Yes, small friend, join us as we have much fun and good times together!"

Annie was right behind him, thanking him as she skipped over to Amumu. Her smile was the only thing Amumu thought about ever since they met... She didn't say anything, but she gently took Amumu's hand, kissing his cheek as Janna walked with them to the door, which now stood open.

"Amumu." Nasus said, a hint of surprise in his voice. "We didn't see you out here." (Udyr)Helmet Bro was still inside, clearing room for morgana and Pantheon's baked things.

"I'm sorry." Amumu said, Annie still holding his hand as they all walked in, Nami apologized as well as Soraka, whom both hugged him tight, bringing him over to a nearby fireplace, the poros that were under Braum's shield quickly bounced around the room, a few curling up against Amumu by the fire, Annie sitting beside the other as the rest of the group chatted and laughed together. It was nice to be out of the rain... But it was nicer to be with friends.


(Couldn't help it, needed to write a little something X3 Never walk alone ever, life's too short to be stuck in the rain without someone to share an umbrella with. much love Adonna.)
But {{champion:77}} wasn't there. It must've been Helmet bro cuz it was definitely not {{champion:77}}
You dressed up like a cake?

The league community sitting in a room. Rito opens the door and everything goes quiet.....Rito has a paper in his hands, walks to the center of the room and very very slowly places the paper on a table that is directly lit. "I'm just gonna leave this here..." says Rito. A League community member darts forward and grabs the paper and reads it silently.....slams the paper down and eyes Rito with intense suspicions. Rito, in the tense silence, shruggs and slowly backs out of the room into darkness.

^What just happened here.

> [{quoted}](name=C Raynor,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=ddmqPNdQ,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2016-03-18T17:40:02.042+0000)
>
> The league community sitting in a room. Rito opens the door and everything goes quiet.....Rito has a paper in his hands, walks to the center of the room and very very slowly places the paper on a table that is directly lit. "I'm just gonna leave this here..." says Rito. A League community member darts forward and grabs the paper and reads it silently.....slams the paper down and eyes Rito with intense suspicions. Rito, in the tense silence, shruggs and slowly backs out of the room into darkness.
> 
> ^What just happened here.

A second summoner dashes forward, slamming her hand on the paper, it's an invitation. The cali-graphic script is hewn in gold, glittering against her skin as the light hits each word.  She quickly turns it over and reads the words aloud, "Your presence is requested at a stellar costume ball, celebrating the light that surges in a heart of darkness and despair. Prepare to be overwhelmed with happiness. - D'NAS".  Left with more questions than answers, the summoners wondered, "...why would Rito deliver such a mundane message with such enigmatic secrecy?
And who the hell is D'Nas??"...
